definition: fuel gas (coal gas, natural gas, methane etc)
to burn/to ignite/to light/fig. to spark off (hopes)/to start (debate)/to raise (hopes)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: This article introduces a gun type of gas burners for radiating tube and a method of designing combustion unit for radiating tube.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种枪式辐射管燃气燃烧器及其燃烧头的设计。

sentences.english: Oxy-hydrogen flame can replace other flames for cutting billet.
sentences.chinese: 完全可以代替其它燃气用于连铸坯切割。

sentences.english: The moire deflectograms of impingement flow field of real rocket exhausted jet are obtained.
sentences.chinese: 获得了真实火箭燃气射流冲击流场莫尔偏折图。

sentences.english: The manipulation of gas supplies has become a weapon in this contest.
sentences.chinese: 在这场争夺中，操纵燃气供应成为了一件有利武器。

sentences.english: Energy-saving home gas stoves have been the national technology patents.

sentences.english: An initial investigation showed a gas leak from a pipeline going through the plant at Qixia District triggered the blast at about 10:10 am.
sentences.chinese: 初步调查显示，爆炸由管道燃气泄漏引发。

sentences.english: Selection gas stoves mainly to view its security functions.
sentences.chinese: 挑选燃气灶主要是看它的安全性能。

sentences.english: The helix seal was put forward to be used in ultra-micro gas turbine(UMGT) system for reducing gas leakage.
sentences.chinese: 提出将螺旋密封应用于超微燃气透平气体介质密封。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the fault diagnostic expert system that includes system structure, function and self-study capacity for gas generator.
sentences.chinese: 建立了一个适用于燃气轮机的故障诊断专家系统。

sentences.english: The results have testified that fuel gas flow will considerably affect the wear resistance of the metallic card cloth.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，燃气流量对金属针布的耐磨性影响很大。

sentences.english: The development of non-azide gas generant is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了国内外非叠氮燃气发生剂的研制进展。

sentences.english: Products are mainly Gas Water Heaters and Gas Cookers.
sentences.chinese: 产品主要包括燃气快速热水器和燃气灶具。

sentences.english: GE will provide four gas turbine modules per vessel.

sentences.english: The calender B type, use gas hester, it is saving the power and small floor space be occupy.
